pullrequest.title: Add basic support for Image output types

content.raw:
I'm concerned about the change to output\_classes.py that are not contained within the `IMAGE` class. They appear to have come from my original commit of this feature, but that was so long ago I have no idea why they would be made. Perhaps they are worthwhile doing, but I’m very hesitant to endorse those particular lines of code!

Also, from my original commit message:

* device\_base\_class has not been extended to support remote\_value\_checking for this output type
* font\_panel\_settings has not been extended to support saving and loading of the front panel for these output types.  

We should at least create issues in the issue tracker for these before merging \(if we don’t actually implement them first\)
content.html:
I'm concerned about the change to output_classes.py that are not contained within the IMAGE class. They appear to have come from my original commit of this feature, but that was so long ago I have no idea why they would be made. Perhaps they are worthwhile doing, but I’m very hesitant to endorse those particular lines of code!

Also, from my original commit message:

  • device_base_class has not been extended to support remote_value_checking for this output type
  • font_panel_settings has not been extended to support saving and loading of the front panel for these output types.

We should at least create issues in the issue tracker for these before merging (if we don’t actually implement them first)
